results.releaseNotes:
- Support iOS 14
- Fix some bugs and crashes
results.description:
5miles opened a new channel called 5miles Dash. It is a new auction feature that allows you to bid on brand new items.
- Auctions last 90 seconds and bids start at $1.
- Only pay when you win.
- Items are shipped directly to your door.
- If user is unsatisfied with a product, we offer buyer protection so you can request a refund.
- Claim up $22 Coupon package towards your first purchase.

5miles is the highest rated local marketplace app, helping you buy and sell stuff in your area. 5miles is free, easy, and safe and has facilitated more than $1 BILLION in local sales, helping 10 million happy users put money back in their pockets and find great products at great rates.

“5miles is the first to integrate local services into an app of this kind” - CNBC

“The 5miles app is a great way to sell old items AND to buy new things at a fraction of the cost they would be retail.” - Alicia Reneeg, BuzzFeed

“It’s better than Craigslist and it’s better than OfferUp with its attention to informative detail.”  Catherine, 5miles buyer

With 5miles you can also discover great classifieds in your area, find a place to live, hire local services, or get a new job - all from the comfort of your phone.

It’s FREE to list items for sale and FREE to discover local goods and services, all within 5 miles.

Easy
• Snap a photo and offer up your items in seconds
• Use GPS and zip code to find thousands of listings nearby
• Make an offer by sending an in app chat message
• Free to boost your post to send it to the top of the feed
• Easy registration via Facebook or email
• Share your listings via Facebook, Twitter, SMS, and Email

Safe
• Email, phone, and Facebook verifications
• Rate and read reviews of buyers and sellers
• Use our Safe Area Exchange Locator (SEAL) feature to find a secure meetup spot 
• 5miles team constantly monitors listings and chats to keep fraud away
• 5miles doesn't share your information with anyone
• Don't want to meetup? Choose shipping for your exchange method

Fun
• Discover great stuff near and far by browsing photos
• Search and filter to find relevant listing
• Like items and follow sellers
• Make offers and get the best deals
• Chat to share more details, photos, and meeting spots
• Share listings to Facebook and Twitter to sell faster

Shop, make offers, and list items and services for free. It's like your own online garage sale without the hassle.

Find home cleaning, home repair, or home improvement professionals. Get help with chores or errands. Find a mover you can trust. 

Looking for housing or a roommate? Find apartments, houses, and condos for rent or sale. Find a roommate to share your dream loft. Landlords, list your real estate in a snap!

Looking for work? Find jobs near you! Full-time, part-time, freelance jobs, or short gigs.

FREE for everyone.

Download now and discover great listings from the 5miles community. Are you ready to go shopping?

Want to find out more about us?
https://www.5miles.com/
Email: hello@5milesapp.com

results.releaseNotes:
Thank you for your reviews and feedback.

In this release:
• Bug Fixes

In other recent updates:
• UX improvements to the reward redemption workflow
• Trips: A fresh new and simplified user experience to request a change in the trip mode
• A new app launch animation to elevate the user experience for millions of app opens

Let us know your feedback! Love the improvements and love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us go the extra Mile(s). Happy Earning and Redeeming!
results.description:
Miles is a universal rewards app empowering anyone to earn miles automatically for all modes of travel and transportation. You have the flexibility to redeem the free miles you’ve earned for exclusive rewards, discounts, deals, and savings from amazing brands such as HP, DoorDash, Garmin, Peet’s, Shipt, Postmates, Pandora, Reebok, Chewy, Home Chef, and many more.
 
Download Miles today to start earning free miles!

Here's how it works:

Sign up:
Download the app and register. For best results, turn on Location Services and set to Always.

Start earning miles automatically:
Once registered, you do not need to do anything else. You will now start earning miles for every trip you take. You are not required to log your trips, nor open the app before, during, or after the trip. Earning miles is truly automatic and free!

Ways to earn bonus miles:
There are plenty of ways to earn bonus miles in the app!
 
For a limited time, even more extra bonus miles for activity trips - Earn 20x miles for walk, run, and bike trips
2x miles for carpooling
3x miles for using transits - train, bus, boat/ferry
Referring your friends
Tier upgrades
Birthdays
Holidays and anniversaries
Special promo codes from our social media

Redeem your miles for exclusive rewards:
The Miles app will keep track of all your miles and you can redeem those miles for any of the exclusive rewards in the app. You can use the rewards instantly or at a later date. You will find rewards that can be used online or at a physical location from merchants across the following categories:

Retail
Shopping
Dining
Groceries
Household
Health and Beauty
Electronics
Travel
Kids
Auto
Other

Buzz about Miles:
“Finally there's a way to get recognized for all the travel you do — even if it's just a walk around the corner. It adds up.” - Mashable

“Miles gives you reward miles for almost everything” - TechCrunch

“It’s a great way of adding value to the travel you otherwise wouldn’t be rewarded for.” - The Points Guy

Why users love the Miles app:
“I spend nothing to earn miles and redeem them for products I love. Simple and easy to use.” - Paula T.

“Miles is for everyone - doesn't matter if you take a transit, drive, use rideshare, bike or simply walk.” - Bank P.

“What I like about miles is that it encourages users to use sustainable transportation but doesn't force them to.” - Ken G.

Learn more:
Website: www.getmiles.com
Facebook: facebook.com/getmilesapp
Instagram: instagram.com/getmilesapp
Twitter: twitter.com/getmilesapp
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/getmiles/
Terms of Service: https://www.getmiles.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.getmiles.com/privacy

Thanks for being a Miles user! Need help? Reach us at support@getmiles.com.
